channel.title: Art on edel grace altares

item.title: Weekly Drawing #0
item.description:
My SO suggested we start a weekly drawing. So we pick a picture of something to draw and at the end of the week we share it. Last week we drew elephants. Here’s my elephant! I think I’m going to stick to pencil drawings. I’m not good at drawing by any means and this was pretty easy, honestly. It was fun drawing it though!
Versus what I was trying to draw… I see clearly what I should have done differently now, haha.
